name: Keith Uy
bio: Founder of WinflowAI and Co-founder of Vantage Insights Systems. I build AI and no-code automations that streamline operations and scale revenue. My systems power data tracking for an 8-figure restaurant group, automate marketing workflows for multimillion-dollar agencies, and accelerate lead response for AI consulting firms. Based in the Philippines, focused on practical automation that drives measurable growth.
